info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 24 at 9:54AM CDT until July 28 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Des Moines IA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Des Moines IA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Iowa...
Iowa River near Tama Hwy E49 affecting Tama and Poweshiek Counties.
Cedar River at Cedar Falls affecting Black Hawk county.
Cedar River at Waterloo affecting Black Hawk county.
Shell Rock River at Shell Rock affecting Butler, Bremer and Black Hawk counties.
* WHAT...Flooding is possible.
* WHERE...The Cedar River at Cedar Falls, or from the West Fork Cedar River to the Cedar Falls-Waterloo city limits.
* WHEN...From Saturday morning to late Monday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 91.0 feet, Water affects Big Woods Rd south of Dunkerton Rd as well as the north parking lot of Island Park.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 85.1 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 89.0 feet.
info.instruction:
For the latest waterway observations and forecasts refer to weather.gov/desmoines/water.
River forecasts include observed precipitation plus forecast precipitation over the next 24 hours.

parameter.value: FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO LATE MONDAY EVENING
